wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Joy Foot (born 14 March 1965) is an English former butterfly swimmer.

Jaime King (swimmer)
response: She is best known for winning the bronze medal at the 1997 European Championships (long course) in the women's 4×100-metre medley relay, alongside Sarah Price, Caroline Foot and Karen Pickering. She represented England and won a bronze medal in the 4 x 100 metres medley relay event, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
